content: pumpkin stem hat quick to knit this charming little hat is knit in the round and features centre double decreases for detail perfect for using up your favourite green scraps a loopy icord stem completes the look materials needed 2 75mm dpn s green worsted-weight yarn sample hat was knit in patons canadiana spring green 3 2g of this yarn was used darning needle scissors skills required cast on knitting in the round centre double decreases i-cord abbreviations co = cast on k = knit cdd = centre double decrease slip 2 stitches together knitwise knit 1 stitch pass slipped stitches back over the knit stitch 2 stitches decreased instructions co 55 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist stitches round 1 *k4 cdd k4* repeat to end of row 45 stitches round 2 *k3 cdd k3* repeat to end of row 35 stitches round 3 *k2 cdd k2* repeat to end of row 25 stitches round 4 *k1 cdd k1* repeat to end of row 15 stitches round 5 *cdd* to end of row 5 stitches round 6- 16 k all stitches row 17 k2tog k1 k2tog 3 stitches move stitches to a single needle and knit i-cord for 2 5 3 st cut yarn and bind off weave in ends finishing curl i-cord stem into a loop and stitch in place with same-coloured yarn block base of stem into star shape
